Header.title: Aspiring Software Developer
Header.paragraph: Junior Student at Florida Polytechnic University Currently working with Python, C#, C++, SQL, ReactJS, JSON, and Azure to build innovative and efficient solutions.

About.paragraph: Hi, I’m Mauricio! I’m a Junior Computer Science student at Florida Polytechnic University with a strong interest in software development and cloud computing. I enjoy working with technologies like Python, C#, C++, SQL, ReactJS, JSON, and Azure to create efficient and innovative solutions.
About.paragraph2: My goal is to leverage my skills to build scalable applications and contribute to impactful projects. Outside of coding, I enjoy listening to audiobooks and podcasts, playing guitar, and designing systems for games—activities that fuel my creativity and problem-solving mindset.

Services.name: Fast Learner
Services.text: Adapted to learning complex programming concepts under strict time constraints while balancing work responsibilities. Demonstrates strong ability to quickly grasp new technologies and apply them effectively.

Services.name: User-Centric System Insight
Services.text: Gained hands-on experience with retail inventory systems while working at Publix. This insider perspective helps me understand the user side of enterprise systems and identify opportunities for improving workflows and usability.

Services.name: Cloud Computing with Azure
Services.text: Developed hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure while deploying and managing this portfolio website. Learned essential cloud concepts, including hosting, resource management, and scalability, to deliver a reliable and accessible web application.

Services.name: Bilingual Communication
Services.text: Fluent in English and Spanish, enabling effective communication with diverse teams and clients. Skilled at bridging language gaps and providing excellent support for Spanish-speaking users.”

Services.name: Problem Solving & Algorithmic Thinking
Services.text: Strengthened problem-solving skills through coursework in Algorithm Analysis and Design. Experienced in breaking down complex challenges and creating efficient, optimized solutions using structured approaches.

Services.name: Team Collaboration & Leadership
Services.text: Experienced in leading both coding projects and operational teams. Skilled at observing team members’ strengths and assigning tasks based on their talents and preferences, resulting in improved efficiency and timely project completion.
